Articles.Content:
https://db.tt/8jxPBs8G

For whatever reason, only 1 of the 5 engines fire on this ship. it says that the engine is oxidizer deprived but it is still attached as is the fuel tank.

anyone know how to fix this?

Pictures of your ship, with the HUD visible, are usually enough for others to diagnose the trouble you're having. Can you post a few screenshots?

Also, moved to gameplay questions, on the assumption that it will turn out to be a design problem.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Here is the album

Right click the tanks, do they have oxidizer in them (maybe you tweaked them out)?

Also, what mods are you using?
The first pic in your album shows 4 of 5 engines not getting any fuel which is odd, but it doesn't look like there is anything wrong.

I downloaded and tested it out.

It is the Bi-coupler that you have clipped in to sit the cupola module on that is blocking the fuel flow.

Because you used symmetry to attach all those engines it blocked the fuel flow to the other engines.

To get it to work I detached the Bi-coupler and Cupola module then you have to take the engines that do not work off and put them back on again.

You may have to attach the Cupola module in a different way to not block fuel flow.

Let me know if you need any pics or a vid to help I would be glad to do so.
thanks pauly, i think i understand. you are awesome.
